peka_b40.name: Peka B40 Eligibility
peka_b40.description: Financial assistance for low-income Malaysians aged 40+
peka_b40.description_ms: Bantuan kewangan untuk rakyat Malaysia berpendapatan rendah berumur 40 tahun ke atas

conditions.error_message: Must be 40 years old or above

any.description_ms: Pendapatan isi rumah RM 2,500 atau ke bawah

conditions.error_message: Must either receive STR or have household income RM 2,500 or below
conditions.error_message_ms: Mesti menerima STR atau pendapatan isi rumah RM 2,500 atau ke bawah

household_income.question: What is your household monthly income in ringgit?
household_income.question_ms: Berapakah pendapatan isi rumah anda sebulan dalam ringgit?

existing_aids.question: Are you currently receiving Sumbangan Tunai Rahmah (STR) or other cash aids?
existing_aids.question_ms: Adakah anda sedang menerima Sumbangan Tunai Rahmah (STR) atau bantuan tunai lain?

eligible.title: You are eligible for Peka B40!
eligible.message: Based on your profile, you meet the requirements for Peka B40 assistance. You can proceed to apply.
eligible.message_ms: Berdasarkan profil anda, anda memenuhi syarat untuk bantuan Peka B40. Anda boleh teruskan permohonan.

not_eligible.title: You are not eligible for Peka B40
not_eligible.title_ms: Anda tidak layak untuk Peka B40
not_eligible.message: Unfortunately, you do not meet the current eligibility criteria. Please explore other government assistance programs.
not_eligible.message_ms: Maaf, anda tidak memenuhi kriteria kelayakan semasa. Sila terokai program bantuan kerajaan yang lain.

pending.title: Eligibility check pending
pending.message: We need more information to determine your eligibility. Please answer the additional questions.
pending.message_ms: Kami memerlukan maklumat tambahan untuk menentukan kelayakan anda. Sila jawab soalan tambahan.
